item.description:
Let's go out to Chunky's Cinema and Pub in Haverhill for few laughs and a good movie.


About the movie:
In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous. Rated PG-13. This movie was released on 4/9 and the reviews look really good.

Time:
The movie starts at 12:30 let's meetup at 11:45. Please note we will only wait in the lobby for 15 minutes, if you are running late come into the theatre and find us.

Seating:
If you haven't been to Chunky's before the seats are set up with a table so you can eat/drink comfortably.

For more information on Chunky's theatre: http://www.chunkys.co... Chunky's has a great selection on their pub menu.

Directions:
Chunky's is located in Westgate Plaza. Take Route 495 to exit 49. If heading North on 495, turn right at the end of the ramp, left at first light, 1/4 mile down road on left-hand side. If heading South on 495, turn left at the end of the ramp, left at first light, 1/4 mile down road on left-hand side.

If you are running late or get lost call the Meetup phone at 978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

We look forward to seeing you!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the lobby
item.name: Movie: Date Night
